short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Pomodoro Timer with task lists and notifications

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Runs a timer with focus sessions and breaks on your chrome browser. You can customize the timer length and add tasks to focus on. These are easily viewable on the popup and main page. There are also options to allow notifications and complete/delete tasks.
